memberdef.name: ops
memberdef.initializer:
= { .notify_message = finch_notify_message, .close_notify = finch_close_notify, .notify_formatted = finch_notify_formatted, .notify_email = finch_notify_email, .notify_emails = finch_notify_emails, .notify_userinfo = finch_notify_userinfo,
.notify_searchresults = finch_notify_searchresults, .notify_searchresults_new_rows = finch_notify_sr_new_rows, .notify_uri = NULL }

memberdef.argsstring: (PurpleNotifyMsgType type, const char *title, const char *primary, const char *secondary)
memberdef.name: finch_notify_message

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *title, const char *primary, const char *secondary, const char *text)
memberdef.name: finch_notify_formatted

memberdef.argsstring: (PurpleConnection *gc, size_t count, gboolean detailed, const char **subjects, const char **froms, const char **tos, const char **urls)
memberdef.name: finch_notify_emails

memberdef.argsstring: (PurpleConnection *gc, const char *subject, const char *from, const char *to, const char *url)
memberdef.name: finch_notify_email

memberdef.argsstring: (PurpleConnection *gc, const char *title, const char *primary, const char *secondary, PurpleNotifySearchResults *results, gpointer data)
memberdef.name: finch_notify_searchresults

simplesect.para: The PurpleNotifyUiOps structure populated with the appropriate functions.
